description:
11.38 colorlevels
Adjust video input frames using levels.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: colorlevels

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input black point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: rimin

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input black point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: gimin

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input black point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: bimin

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input black point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: aimin

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input white point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Input levels are used to lighten highlights (bright tones), darken shadows (dark tones), change the balance of bright and dark tones.
options.name: rimax

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input white point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Input levels are used to lighten highlights (bright tones), darken shadows (dark tones), change the balance of bright and dark tones.
options.name: gimax

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input white point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Input levels are used to lighten highlights (bright tones), darken shadows (dark tones), change the balance of bright and dark tones.
options.name: bimax

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha input white point. Allowed ranges for options are [-1.0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Input levels are used to lighten highlights (bright tones), darken shadows (dark tones), change the balance of bright and dark tones.
options.name: aimax

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output black point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: romin

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output black point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: gomin

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output black point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: bomin

options.description: Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output black point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 0.
options.name: aomin

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output white point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Output levels allows manual selection of a constrained output level range.
options.name: romax

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output white point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Output levels allows manual selection of a constrained output level range.
options.name: gomax

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output white point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Output levels allows manual selection of a constrained output level range.
options.name: bomax

options.description:
Adjust red, green, blue and alpha output white point. Allowed ranges for options are [0, 1.0]. Defaults are 1.

Output levels allows manual selection of a constrained output level range.
options.name: aomax

options.description:
Set preserve color mode. The accepted values are:

‘none’

Disable color preserving, this is default.

‘lum’

Preserve luminance.

‘max’

Preserve max value of RGB triplet.

‘avg’

Preserve average value of RGB triplet.

‘sum’

Preserve sum value of RGB triplet.

‘nrm’

Preserve normalized value of RGB triplet.

‘pwr’

Preserve power value of RGB triplet.
options.name: preserve
